purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information about material used in the design of product that relates to the design process only. This not include any other properties of material that may relate to the manufacture of the product.

inscope.li: identification of the material of a product;
identification of the material of a shape of a product;
identification of the material of an element of a shape of a product;
identification of product properties derived from the material composition of a product;
representation of the value of a material property as specified or measured in a particular environment.

outscope.li: description of the composition of a material.
